review.title: “Not recommended for junior and mid level employees.”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Well organized.2. highly disciplined management.
review.cons: Cons – 1. Packages are offered is very low as per industry.2. No growth in terms of package and position3. New offers are spoiled during notice period.4.No friendly work environment in maintained5. No care about night shift employees, no satisfied night shift allowances provided.6. No employee privacy at work, every employee monitored by cc cams through out the day.7. Employee trained on work process, which is too complex and not at all worth,
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – 1. Offer reasonable packages as per industry2. Take care of night shift employees.3. Maintain comfortable work environment
